data.text: @Russell89767079 @PublicHealthW @WelshGovernment Only need to see the comments on the thread to see why
@gp_welsh @PublicHealthW My world? I’m not the one make up a fantasy world of pretend.
@Garethjosprey @PublicHealthW Whatever you choose to believe. Clearly nothing will influence you in your world.

@gp_welsh @PublicHealthW Calling you a Buffoon, abuse 😂. Bless you babes. If you are that much of a snowflake you shouldn’t troll. Your opinion isn’t based on fact and experience due to the fact you are a fake account. Why do people like you do this.

@Garethjosprey @PublicHealthW Is abuse your only option when faced with an opinion different to yours, based on facts and experience? Need to consider what you are and what you’re saying. Oh and maybe try extra lessons in English grammar.
@gp_welsh @PublicHealthW Stop being silly and stop pretending to be a real GP. If you was you’d know the real risk. Buffoon.
@Garethjosprey @PublicHealthW Because you wouldn’t be describing a potentially lethal respiratory virus as a cold if you had any insight at all into just how bad it is.

@Russell89767079 @Julesvine2000 @gp_welsh @PublicHealthW I don’t wear one because they don’t work and they are very dirty. If users are being dirty and using them with hygiene a priority then it is my responsibility to educate. You could spread things to me. Mask wearing in a community setting is vile.
@Bob23308269 @PublicHealthW @WelshGovernment Why do you look at it then???
